Articles.Content: Most of it's fuel, it has 3069 units of it.
My mistral class is going through some flying pains. Time to expand it.
Your all making helicarriers eh? I can't wait to see more, Spartwo's was awesome.

Not done yet though. I can list tons of issues.

-TWR doesn't allow liftoff from the ground.

-Can't walk on a hovering ship so the advanced IVA will be an issue.

-375 parts!!

-COL pulls the nose up.

-Won't function as an ordinary boat.

-Using LFO tanks was a terrible idea.,

->More things wrong.

In other news: I severely overestimated the size of ring needed but I r bad at docking so it can't hurt.
Okay, it seems that making a boat that can fly is hard, why not try using intakes on the bottom of the ship for landing.

They don't need a complete redesign, you just need to make sure they don't clip with the wings.

It doesn't matter now I've done it. The Ultimate weapon. Fueled by Kraken Plasma, this super-weapon will render armor irrelevant.

I took a K3 Warhead built by Chiboko and slightly modified it to suit my purposes

Javascript is disabled. View full album

http://www./view/o19q79zz7j17kst/Kraken's_Boomstick.craft

Test this out against ur ships. I want the destruction... I want the pics. SHOW ME THE POWER OF THE KRAKEN!!!!
Later, I'm tired.

I tested your new missile on my Temeraire and it seems that you need some considerable distance to make it effective. Somehow the Temeraire took no damage, likely due to her wedge-shaped and duel-layered armour.
Hmm... That is pretty unfortunate, I'll have to find another way.... Maybe a missle with a drillbit tip would work....
I brought the battle group together for a photo shoot

@The Fleet Master
Thanks for the interview.

Alright, who's next?
The warning at the start makes it seem like the most professional thing.
Mullican it's pronounced Spar-too...

Do you wish for me to tell idan? It will be wonderful.

I'm actually building a new construct. Unknown what the use will be at this point.

I actually started working on this ship.

The engines will be vacuum energy driven, reverse engineered from forerunner engines. Or I just slapped some archers in them for kraken based propulsion.

Stealth is the key work here. I might even make this.

What class of ship is this?

By my own system, the top ship is an Interpreter Class War Cruiser while the bottom one is a Shiv Class Stealth Destroyer.

In the Halo universe, the top one is an UNSC Carrier. The bottom one is unknown, but thought to be in the same class as the UNSC Point Of No Return. (The Point Of No Return is ONI's mobile headquarters while also being the largest prowler class vessel ever built, or known. It even has a conference room called Odin's Eye, which is concealed within a Faraday Cage and seamless doors.)

Edited May 25, 2014 by andrew123

They don't need a complete redesign, you just need to make sure they don't clip with the wings.

Actually they do. Those old parasites weren't "parasitic" enough.

Probably the best fighter I've ever made.

I'll give you a hint why they are called "Parasite Fighters"
They are awesome, i'm going to guess that they latch on to their prey.

I present the 'Achilles' Class Battleship, it is armed with 3 I-beams per side, 4 I-beams in the bow and 2 SRBs in the bow. Her armour is strong and double-layered in some areas, she comes in at 318 parts and 105 tons. She is also equipped with drop-tanks, RCS and 1.25 meter docking ports.

The kommander, I'm working on a much larger version based on Prometheus from stargate as well

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Just remember that you can also make your own company.

Just remember that you can also make your own company.

True this is the third ship I made this week, I'm thinking about tl starting a company that allows any popular mod or something like that, but I would need someone else to help because there are some weeks where I may be inactive at times
If you'd like I could PM you a download for Achilles for you to reverse engineer. However it'll have to wait because I'm not a home now.

I believe I've finally hit a sweet spot. This isn't a giant ship at 80 tons, and not part heavy at under 300 parts while being both maneuverable, decent ranged, extremely well armored, and carrying above average weapons capacity along with plenty of power. It even has a honeycomb decentralized structural design to ensure enhanced survivability and to look cool.

In two trial runs, it fell at over 100 m/s and sustained minor damages with both the fuel tank and engines intact and operational, while in a 120 m/s drop it lost the fuel tank and engines, but the whole ship was otherwise unscathed. I call it the UNSC Bladerunner.

Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/51s6o23fy3ukj37/UNSC%20Bladerunner%20Prowler%20MKI.craft

The latest addition to my prowler corps.

It can be modified for electronic warfare. (SIGNIT and ASSW.).

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I'll have to put her against my 'Achilles' for a test, see how good her armour is and whether it can withstand one of her broadsides. No ship has survived a broadside from 'Temeraire' and the same system is present on 'Achilles'.
